name: Asteroids But With A Laser
description:
A short little asteroids clone where instead of firing a bullet you fire a laser.

I made this so I could prove to myself that I could get something done. I hope to waste at least five minutes of you day. Thank you.

How To Play

Up Arrow for thrust.

Left/Right Arrow to turn.

Space bar to fire/ select options.

Collect power orbs to recharge your laser. Don't Let your charge run out!

Watch out for aliens!
